snippet: Helped by advances in technology and social networking, sharing rides is becoming easier and more popular in the United States.
abstract: Sharing rides for commuting and long-distance trips is becoming easier and more popular in the United States, helped by advances in technology and social networking; some companies are testing apps for car-pooling, which include matching drivers with passengers, security protocols and how payments are calculated and made.
lead_paragraph: Helped by advances in technology and social networking, sharing rides is becoming easier and more popular in the United States.

headline.seo: Technology Makes Car-Pooling Safer and Easier
headline.main: Car-Pooling Makes a Surge on Apps and Social Media
headline.print_headline: Car-Pooling, a Tough Sell, Makes a Surge on Apps and Social Media
